X.i.4.C.2.f
.
When Recertifications of Service Are Required
Recertifications of service are required only for the 14th Infantry, AUS, cases.
Reference
:Â  For information on eligibility of service in the 14th Infantry, AUS, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.B.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
